name: Animal Blast!
description:
A Match-3 game that I created as a learning project. It has 5 animal characters that each have a different power that affects the board. Row and column bombs can be made by matching four or more together. Powers are upgradeable after gaining a certain number of points from each game that you play. 

Controls:

Drag and swap balls to make matches on the board.

Right click when animal power bar is full to activate its power.
